overview.title: Building Healthcare Excellence
paragraphs: The Department of Allied Health Sciences at niramaya institute of health sciences is committed to developing highly skilled healthcare professionals in critical support specialties. Established in 2023, our department offers three comprehensive Bachelor of Science programs designed to meet the growing demand for qualified allied health professionals.

With state-of-the-art laboratories, modern equipment, and experienced faculty, we provide students with rigorous academic training combined with extensive clinical exposure. Our programs are affiliated with RGUHS, Bengaluru and approved by the Government of Karnataka.

Students gain hands-on experience in hospital settings through clinical rotations and mandatory internships, preparing them for successful careers in hospitals, diagnostic centers, research institutions, and healthcare companies worldwide.

overview.title: Excellence in Nursing Education
paragraphs: The Department of Nursing at niramaya institute of health sciences is dedicated to developing competent, compassionate, and ethical nursing professionals. Established in 2023, our department operates under the guidance of Rajiv Gandhi University of Health Sciences (RGUHS), Bengaluru and is approved by the Karnataka State Nursing Council and Government of Karnataka.

We provide a comprehensive 4-year B.Sc Nursing program that combines rigorous academic coursework with extensive clinical training. Our curriculum is designed to equip students with the knowledge, skills, and values necessary to excel in diverse healthcare settings and make a meaningful impact on patient care and community health.

With state-of-the-art laboratories, experienced faculty, and partnerships with leading hospitals, we ensure our students receive the best possible education and practical experience to launch successful careers in nursing.
